context.p: If you want to transfer your license key to another computer (for example, if you are disposing of your old computer or transferring it to another person), you must first unregister your license. You can then register your license on the new computer in the normal way.
To unregister a license, prior to transferring it, follow this procedure:

step.stepresult: The license registration dialog box is displayed.

step.product: author developer editor authorEclipse developerEclipse editorEclipse
step.cmd: Make sure the Use a license key option is selected.
The license key field should be empty (this is normal). If it is not empty, delete any text in the field.
Click the Remove button at the bottom-right corner of the dialog box.
step.stepresult: A confirmation message is displayed asking if you want to remove your license key.

choices.choice: Yes - Removes your license key from your user account on the current computer.
No - Falls back to your previous license key, if applicable.
